{"id":539624831,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1629161238,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/539624831/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s.length()==0) return 0;\n        unordered_map<char,int>mp;\n        mp[s[0]]=0;\n        int b=0,i,mx=0;\n        for(i=1;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(mp.count(s[i])){\n                mx=max(mx,i-b);\n                b=max(b,mp[s[i]]+1);\n                mp[s[i]]=i;\n            }\n            else mp[s[i]]=i;\n        }\n        return max(mx,i-b);\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
